title: Phillips Teaze 2 Concave Shape Hair Brush With Nylon & Boar Bristles For Penetration & Lift
description: * 3 Row Styler* One Nylon White Ball Tipped Bristle in each clump of Boar Bristle for Reinforcement* Concave Bristle Shape Fits the Shape of the Head* Staggered bristle height for easier lift and penetration* Polished Natural Wood with Pinch Grip Handle for Control* Overall Size: 9" Long X 3/4" Wide* Bristle Length 3/8" to 5/8" * Made in China

title: Vanicream Sunscreen, Sensitive Skin, SPF 30, 4-Ounce,
description: VanicreamTM Sunscreen SPF 30 is a broad spectrum sunscreen that protect your skin throughout the UVA spectrum and provide more protection than your natural sunburn protection (UVB). While all sunscreens protect your skin from the sun's burning UVB rays, the SPF 30 sunscreen contain zinc oxide, an ingredient that offers additional protection from the UVA rays which may contribute to skin damage and premature aging of the skin. Antioxidants in the formulas help prevent damage to the skin by neutralizing free radicals produced when skin is exposed to the sun.                                                                                                                                                     Active Ingredients: SPF 30: titanium dioxide 5%, zinc oxide 5%                                                                                                             Inactive ingredients: alumina, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, caprylic/capric triglyceride, cetearyl isononanoate, cetyl alcohol, isopropyl titanium triisostearate/triethoxycaprylylsilane crosspolymer, magnesium sulfate, methylpropanediol, PEG-12 dimethicone, PEG-30 dipolyhydroxystearate, phenyl trimethicone, polyethylene, polyhydroxystearic acid, purified water, sodium ascorbyl phosphate, stearyl dimethicone, tetrasodium EDTA, tocopheryl acetate, triethoxycaprylylsilane

title: Bio-Oil, 2-Ounce Bottle
description: Bio-Oil is an award-winning specialist skincare product that is clinically proven to improve the appearance of scars, pregnancy stretch marks, and uneven skin tone. Thanks to PurCellin Oil, a proprietary laboratory copy of the preen gland oil of ducks, Bio-Oil is also effective for many other skin conditions such as aging and dehydrated skin..caption { font-family: Verdana, Helvetica neue, Arial, serif; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; } ul.indent { list-style: inside disc; text-indent: 20px; } table.callout { font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, serif; margin: 10px; width: 250; } td.callout { height: 100 percent; background: #9DC4D8 url(http://images.amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/callout-bg.png) repeat-x; border-left: 1px solid #999999; border-right: 1px solid #999999; padding: 10px; width: 250px; } ul.callout { list-style: inside disc; text-indent: -12px; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.5em; } h5.callout { text-align: center; }Bio-Oil features:Clinically proven formula to reduce appearance of scars and stretch marks.Moisturizing and enhancing vitamins and oils.Non-acnegenic and hypo-allergenic ingredients.Proprietary PurCellin Oil that helps targeted absorption into the skin.The Bio-Oil formula comprises a special mix of plant oils and vitamins.View larger.PurCellin Oil allows for targeted absorption into the skin.View larger.View complete list ofingredients.Specially Formulated With PurCellin OilBio-Oil includes the breakthrough ingredient PurCellin Oil, a recreation of the preen gland oil of ducks. During preening, a duck secretes oil from its preen gland and distributes it over its entire plumage in the familiar twisted-neck action that one often associates with ducks. This oil creates a thin, non-greasy layer on the surface of the feathers without which water would not pearl off and the bird would struggle to swim. This ingredient acts as a delivery system for Bio-Oil's other ingredients, improving spreadability and allowing for targeted absorption into the skin.Also, because oil contains no oxygen, it provides an exceptional storage environment for vitamins. Bio-Oil includes many beneficial skin ingredients such as Vitamin A, Vitamin E, calendula oil, lavender oil, rosemary oil, and chamomile oil. This mix of plant oils and vitamins has been clinically shown to be beneficial to the skin.Effective on Scars and Stretch MarksBio-Oil helps improve the appearance of all types of scars and is also highly effective in helping maintain elasticity of scar tissue on joints and other high-mobility areas, including stretch marks. Ideal for pregnant women, particularly in their second and third trimesters, Bio-Oil is the product most recommended by UK pharmacists to help reduce the appearance of scars, stretch marks, and pregnancy stretch marks.Great for Skin Tone and Dry SkinBio-Oil helps improve the appearance of uneven skin tone caused by excessive sun, hormonal fluctuations, or skin-lighteners. Sagging and wrinkled skin that is associated with aging also benefits from Bio-Oil. Much wrinkled and sagging skin is caused by the weakening of the collagen and elastin support system in the dermis. Bio-Oil helps soften and smooth the skin, making it more supple and reducing the appearance of wrinkles.Bio-Oil also does a wonderful job at moisturizing and has sufficient moisturizing properties so as to render an additional moisturizer unnecessary.Non-Acnegenic and Hypo-AllergenicBio-Oil is a non-acnegenic and hypo-allergenic product, meaning it has a decreased tendency to cause allergies and acne, and it is safe for use on sensitive skin.

title: Physicians Formula Organic Wear Mascara, Jumbo Lash, Ultra Black Organics 7352
description: 100% natural origin. 100% free of: harsh chemicals; synthetic preservatives; parabens; clumping; smudging; flaking; fibers; dyes. Ecocert. EcoBlend featuring OrganiSoy & Eco-Olive. Big, thick, dramatic lashes! Jumbo 100% recyclable eco-brush. 1st ever (Ecocert certified organic line of makeup in the US). 100% free of harsh chemicals. 100% free of synthetic preservatives. 100% free of parabens. 100% free of GMO's (genetically modified organisms). 100% free of synthetic colors. 100% free of synthetic fragrances. 100% cruelty free. Hypoallergenic. Fragrance free. Ophthalmologist approved. How green is your makeup? 100% of the total ingredients are from natural origin. 47% of the total ingredients are from organic farming. 100% dramatic volume & glamour. Big, thick dramatic lashes, naturally! Revolutionary formula features 100% natural volumizing technology to dramatically maximize & intensify lash volume! Jumbo 100% Recyclable Eco-Brush: Jumbo volumizing brush creates the ultimate full, thick and dramatic lashes instantly with ultra-soft plastic bristles. Formulated with EcoBlend to Perfect & Protect: OrganiSoy: Moisturizes and helps nourish lashes. Eco-Olive: Natural antioxidant shields lashes from harsh environmental aggressors. Traditional Mascara: Synthetic solvents - can cause dry, brittle lashes; Synthetic polymers - can cause lash clumping & build-up on brush; Synthetic preservatives - used to preserve and extend mascara shelf life; Synthetic fibers - used to volumize and can cause eye irritation; Synthetic color pigments; Petroleum by products - can cause irritation. 100% Natural Origin Mascara: 100% Free of Synthetic Solvents - coats lashes without breakage & drying; Organic orange water - extracted from orange fruits to hydrate and moisturize; Organic aloe and cucumber extracts

title: Nifty Cosmetic Organizing Carousel, Cream
description: The Nifty cosmetic organizing carousel is an elegant way to organize your cosmetics and vanity. The lazy susan base rotates 360 degrees, which makes finding each of your cosmetic products extremely easy. The cosmetic organizer will hold each of your cosmetic accessories, from the larger sized brushes to the smaller hard to find bobby pins and hair pieces. The cosmetic organizer's space saving design takes up very little of your precious counter space, while holding all of your beauty products.

title: Ardell Brow and Lash Growth Accelerator, 0.25-Ounce (Pack of 3)
description: Brow & lash growth accelerator is a concentrated serum of multi-proteins that works to immediately repair week lashes and restore thickness of over-tweezed or thinning brows.  added conditioners soften dry, brittle lashes enabling them to grow longer, thicker, and fuller.

title: SKINFOOD Salmon Darkcircle Concealer Cream #1 Blooming Light Beige (Whitening Care) 10g
description: 10g Look refreshed and energized with Skin Food's Salmon Dark Circle Concealer Cream. Reduce the appearance of dark circles around the eyes with the extracts of salmon roe. Salmon Dark Circle Concealer #1 is designed for those with lighter skin tones. For darker skin tones, try #2. Concentrated and creamy, it effectively covers dark eye circles and wrinkles. Can be easily applied without irritation. How to Use: After applying foundation, dispense an adequate amount and gently tap dark circle concealer cream onto dark circles around the eyes.

title: Tarte Cosmetics Gifted Amazonian Clay Smart Mascara 0.24 oz.
description: Tarte Cosmetics Gifted Amazonian Clay Smart Mascara intuitively identifies and treats your specific lash concerns. Amazonian clay balances oil production and hydration while repairing dry, brittle shafts and revitalizing follicles for thicker, fuller-looking lashes. Rice bran proteins and carnauba wax help to extend lash length and mineral-based pigments ensure bold color and well-defined volume. Black is a jet black shade.

title: It's So BIG Volumizing Mascara (Black) by Elizabeth Mott Net Weight 0.33 fl oz/10ml
description: After years of disappointing mascaras, that failed to deliver what they were supposed to do, I searched all over the world to create a mascara that gave me BIG volume. Working with the top cosmetics laboratories, I formulated the perfect volumizing mascara that didn't smudge and can be worn all day. I wear this mascara to the gym (shhh, it's a secret!), and it will not budge even after a long run or spinning class!The secret weapon:The hourglass brush shape, with its long and short bristle pattern, delivers just the right amount of mascara to each lash (like magic!), watch your lashes grow BIGGER with each layer.We are proud to be cruelty-free!

title: Facial-Flex Ultra
description:
In today's anti-aging battle, increasing numbers of women are performing not only daily exercise for their bodies but are currently recognizing the need to improve facial muscle tone. Just as the principle of dynamic resistance is employed in physical fitness training, this system is used to strengthen and tone the muscles of the face, chin and neck with amazing results. Includes:
Facial-Flex Ultra Device - Made with surgical stainless steel and space-age material for years of durability.
Includes both 6oz and 8oz resistance bands.
Convenient carrying/storage case.
Progress chart
Clinical background
1-year warranty

title: Rapidlash Eyelash Enhancing Serum (3ml), 0.1-Fluid Ounces Bottle
description: This innovative high-performance serum formulated with advanced polypeptides helps amplify the length, thickness and volume of eyelashes with a simple once a day application.  Ideal for women and men, brittle, weak, thin or short lashes and eyebrows.

title: Avon ANEW CLINICAL Advanced Retexturizing Peel
description: Avon Anew Clinical Retexturizing Facial Peel Give your Face a Brand New Fresh Look Now, in 1 easy step! See results superior* to a professional 35% glycolic Facial peel. At home. No appointment necessary. The advanced exfoliator safely retexturizes and resurfaces skin. Formulated with soothing botanicals that help nourish and calm skin. Peels away dullness and visible age damage so healthier skin cells can surface.
brand: Avon Anew Clinical Advanced Retexturizing Peel
